scripts.build-backend: npm run copy-backend-index && npm run copy-backend-package
scripts.frontend-dev: cd frontend && npm run build --prod && move build ../backend/build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm run build --prod && move build ../app/build
scripts.build-app: npm run prebuild && npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.start-build-local: npm run build-app && cd app && npm run start
